code: import axios from"axios";import logger from"./logService";import{toast}from"react-toastify";axios.interceptors.response.use(null,error=>{const expectedError=error.response&&error.response.status>=400&&error.response.status<500;if(!expectedError){logger.log(error);toast.error("An unexpected error occurrred.");}return Promise.reject(error);});function setJwt(jwt){axios.defaults.headers.common["x-auth-token"]=jwt;}export default{get:axios.get,post:axios.post,put:axios.put,delete:axios.delete,setJwt};
